price: Do they not see how many generations We destroyed before them who will never come back to them[8]?
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
footnotes: [8] i.e., to the life of this world.
